p: The PCR efficiency was measured for each pair of primers used inexperiments. For relative quantification of transcript levels, target gene was normalized to the housekeeping gene sigA. The clgR primers (fwd5′AGCTGCAGAGCCGTACAAAT3′, rev 5′CCTCGGGTATCTGTCGGAGA3′, calculated efficiency 2.02) and sigA (fwd5′GACGAAGACCACGAAGAC3′, rev 5′TCATCCCAGACGAAATCAC3′, calculated efficiency 1.98) were synthesized by Sigma-Aldrich. Relative quantification was calculated according to Pfaffl mathematical model [ 24]. The test was carried out in 2 independent experiments and performed in triplicate.
